section.p: To renounce the worship of Alvir and Valmir, you must pay 30 Shards in compensation to the priesthood. The priest says nothing, he just points to a mural on the wall. It depicts the story of a woman who left the temple - a storm destroyed her ship and she drowned, to spend eternity as a lost soul, cleaning the barnacles off the thrones of Alvir and Valmir.

Do you want to change your mind?
If you are determined to renounce your faith,
pay the 30 Shards and delete Alvir and Valmir
from the God box on your Adventure Sheet.
